creator: jmorgan@thekennagroup.com
text:
In my server.xml file I had the following:

    <Connector className="org.apache.coyote.tomcat4.CoyoteConnector"
               port="80" minProcessors="5" maxProcessors="75"
               enableLookups="true" redirectPort="443"
               acceptCount="10" debug="0" connectionTimeout="20000"/>

getRemoteHost() would return the IP address.

If I reverted to the old connector using:

    <Connector className="org.apache.catalina.connector.http.HttpConnector"
               port="80" minProcessors="5" maxProcessors="75"
               enableLookups="true" redirectPort="443"
               acceptCount="10" debug="0" connectionTimeout="60000"/>

getRemoteHost() would return the correct host name.

The condition appered inverted in the code (so actually, setting it to "false"
should work).
I'll commit the fix as soon as the CVS is back up (and I get email again), and
it will be included in 4.1.7.
